Milnacipran is an effective treatment for fibromyalgia. Duloxetine and milnacipran are also effective. Milnacipran is associated with more side effects than duloxetine.
Topiramate is effective in reducing migraine frequency and duration in a subgroup of patients with frequent migraine. Topiramate is also well tolerated.

Divalproex sodium is effective in reducing the frequency of migraine attacks and the number of migraine days per month. The number of migraine attacks per month was significantly less with DVPX compared to placebo. The number of migraine days per month was significantly less with DVPX compared to placebo.
